name: Carot

April 01 2023: Carot will participate in a debate at 9:00.
The debating is about whether it is proper to execute criminals or not.
Carot is an affirmative debater, agreeing the justice of death penalty.

description: Carot is a 15-year-old student at Town High School.
Carot has a passion for debating
The debaters include Alice, Bob, Carot, Dave, Eve, Fedo.
Alice, Bob and Carot are affirmative debaters, while Dave, Eve and Fedo are opposition debaters.
